fix(asset): convert JPEG disguised as PNG an actual PNG
fix(asset): convert JPEG disguised as PNG an actual PNG

Merge pull request #1 from asmundstavdahl/2026-02-09_add-unsigned-release-build

chore(ci): add an unsigned release APK build to GitHub workflow
chore(ci): add an unsigned release APK build to GitHub workflow

Merge pull request #7 from yuga-hashimoto/fix/compilation-errors-mainactivity

fix: resolve compilation errors in MainActivity

fix: resolve compilation errors in MainActivity

- Corrected 'context' variable scope issues in AlertDialog loops
- Fixed resource ID resolution for localized strings
- Improved variable definitions for Compose previews/stability

Merge pull request #6 from yuga-hashimoto/fix/brute-force-tts-initialization

Force TTS Recovery for Hidden MIUI Engines

fix: brute-force TTS initialization and detect hidden engines for MIUI

- Added Package Manager check to identify Google TTS even when hidden by system
- Implemented brute-force initialization sequence targeting com.google.android.tts
- Added manual re-initialization trigger in Diagnostic Panel
- Improved diagnostic messages to clarify 'hidden engine' common in Chinese ROMs
